ai.summary: A short, easy 1.5 km hike to Carn Brea BR 30 in the United Kingdom. The route runs along a grassy bridleway to a hilltop area, suitable for beginners and families seeking a quick outdoor outing with light elevation and open views.
ai.terrain_summary: Grassy bridleway with a gentle ascent, some uneven ground and a few rocky patches near the summit. Open grassland, limited shade, and potential wind at the top.
ai.safety_notes: - Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. - The path can become muddy after rain; use caution on wet sections. - Weather in the UK can change quickly; check forecasts and carry a layer and waterproof if needed. - Stay on marked paths and respect boundaries. - Bring a map or GPS, a charged phone, and emergency contact details. - If mobility is a concern, the ascent is gentle but uneven ground may require careful footing.
recommended_gear: Sun protection (hat, sunscreen) in sunny weather
Fully charged phone with emergency numbers
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn are ideal; summer offers longer daylight and warm conditions; winter can be muddy, windy, and less comfortable.

seo.title: Carn Brea BR 30 – Easy 1.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 1.5 km hike on Carn Brea BR 30 in the United Kingdom. Grassy bridleway, gentle climb, and hilltop views—great for families and beginners.
seo.h1: Carn Brea BR 30: Easy 1.5 km Hike in the UK
